attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that formal written notification be given to the Scottish Governemnt administration to explain how the Chancellor and Prime minister will treat the latest offer by a group of scottish businessmen regarding their taking over of HBOS rather than the present arrangement where Lloyds TSB have been given a virtual monopolistic status.We request that the Scottish government are given confirmation in writing that full and unbiased financial and political support will be given to the Bank of Scotland just as has been already given to other banks in other parts of the UK.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
